text: Tried the dry youmian n it was mind-blowing. The minced pork meatball is their specialty, never seen it anywhere in sg. Very unique delicious flavourful taste. Will 100% come back again. Highly recommended!

This place is amazing - you can really tell the amount of care that these two aunties take in preparing each ingredient. The noodles have great texture and all the condiments are made by them too. What an awesome find!

chanced upon this newly opened banmian stall, pretty decent. the soup is very flavourful when add prawns. meehoonkuay is hand pulled unlike the usual banmian stalls which are machine made. love their chilli, got a sour kick to it

will be back to try their dry version üëç
Awesome comfort food! The noodle texture was chewy and soup was flavorful but not too salty like other places. Very very worth it for the money.

Very flavourful dry version of al dante you mian and im glad to discover this hidden gem in yuhua! Tried the mee hoon kueh soup before and finish all the soup too, very well balanced of taste and texture, highly recommended!
